 ∙ Advise the woman to eat small 
frequent meals; avoid greasy food; eat 
lots of green vegetables; and drink 
plenty of fluids. 
 ∙ If vomiting is excessive in the morning, 
ask her to eat dry foods, such as roti/
paratha, biscuits, or toast, after waking 
up in the morning.
Excessive vomiting, especially 
after the first trimester
